titles.title: Let Us, with a Gladsome Mind

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Let us, with a gladsome mind, praise the LORD, for He is kind: for His mercies shall endure, ever faithful, ever sure.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: He with all-commanding might filled the new-made world with light: for His mercies shall endure, ever faithful, ever sure.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: He His chosen race did bless in the wasteful wilderness: for His mercies shall endure, ever faithful, ever sure.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: He hath with a pious eye looks upon our misery: for His mercies shall endure, ever faithful, ever sure.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Let us therefore warble forth His high majesty and worth: for His mercies shall endure, ever faithful, ever sure.
